title: All-Purpose Gluten-Free Flour Substitute Recipe
full_text:
All-Purpose Gluten-Free Flour Substitute Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
15
to 20 servings
Makes
15 1/2 cups
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
700
g
cornstarch
500
g
tapioca starch
300
g
white rice flour
200
g
brown rice flour
200
g
nonfat milk powder
100
g
potato flour
20
g
xanthan gum
Directions
Whisk together all the ingredients in a bowl. Store in airtight container at room temperature for up to 6 months.
Special Equipment
Digital scale
